amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt sites nominated under the Convention on Wetlands of International Importance Especially as Waterfowl Habitat from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 27 in the Congressional Record of September 25, 1997 to exempt sites nominated under the Convention on Wetlands of International Importance from the provisions of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 220 (Roll no. 498).
